# WinTrim Landing Page

## Project Overview
Next.js 16 landing page for WinTrim.io - a Windows disk analyzer application.

## Design System
- **Aesthetic**: Blade Runner 2049 Tech-Noir
- **Colors**:
  - Void Black: #050505
  - Wallace Amber: #FF9900 (CTAs, warnings)
  - Joi Pink: #FF00FF (accents)
  - K Teal: #00F3FF (data, safe indicators)
  - Off-World Gray: #1F2937 (cards)
- **Fonts**: Rajdhani/Orbitron (headings), JetBrains Mono (body)

## Pages
- `/` - Main landing page
- `/privacy` - Privacy policy

## Links
- GitHub: https://github.com/mobius29er/winLose
- Support: support@foxxception.com
- Domain: WinTrim.io

## Development
npm run dev    # Start development server
npm run build  # Production build
npm run start  # Start production server

## Deployment
Configured for Vercel deployment. Push to GitHub and import in Vercel.
